item.title: Ziro Festival of Music 2018
item.description: Ziro is not a music festival it is an experience A line we heard over and over by countless number of people. I will set a little background first. The only music festivals Karan and I have been to are NH7 and Supersonic and since we were based out of Pune these were not exactly “Outdoor Music Festivals”. So whenever someone repeated the mentioned line I could only wonder what is so different.
